dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5185 IH: To maintain in effect certain sanctions imposed with respect to Iraq in the event of a termination of the applicable declared national emergency, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Crane introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To maintain in effect certain sanctions imposed with respect to Iraq in the event of a termination of the applicable declared national emergency, and for other purposes.

section.text: Notwithstanding any termination of the national emergency declared by the finding of the President on May 22, 2003, in Executive Order 13303 (68 Fed. Reg. 31929; relating to protecting the development fund for Iraq and certain other property in which Iraq has an interest), including a statutory termination taking effect on or after the date of this Actâ€”

paragraph.text: no person included in the List of Specially Designated Nationals and Blocked Persons maintained by the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the Department of the Treasury under the IRAQ2 or IRAQ3 programs may be removed from such List solely as a result of such termination; and
no sanction imposed with respect to a person described in paragraph (1) may be waived solely as a result of such termination.
